description:
After Kanon gets a bad haircut, a mix of the old and new Tesaguri members launch into a discussion of beauty salons and how to make them "new". Later, the original members continue their tour of the zoo, stopping to handle baby chicks and meet a pony. Back at the club, they continue the zoo theme by creating comical haiku with animals as the subject.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play with Beauty Salons and Comic Haiku
美容院と川柳で遊ぼう
